text: Alexandre Luiz Goulart, commonly known simply as Alexandre (born July 24, 1976) is a Brazilian football player. Alexandre appearance in two Campeonato Brasileiro matches for Sport Club Internacional. He spent several years playing football for Boavista F.C. and C.D.
